Package coffee.khyonieheart.hyacinth.util.marker

Annotation Interface NoExceptions

@Target(METHOD) public @interface NoExceptions
Marker annotation used to declare that a method should not legally throw exceptions or be the cause of any exceptions. Throwing exceptions from a method with this annonation or this method being the cause of a thrown exception is considered to be bad practice.
Since:
1.0.0
Author:
Khyonie
